Uses of Class
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.SimEntity

Packages that use SimEntity
Package
Description
me.marcosassuncao.servsim
This package provides the core functions of the service simulation toolkit.
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.function
Provides predicates for searching for specific events and entities.
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler
This package provides multiple scheduling algorithms that the servers can use.
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.server
This package provides the main functionality to create resource pools and servers.
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.util
This package provides classes for reading job traces and creating simulation reports.

  • Uses of SimEntity in me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler

    Subclasses of SimEntity in me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractScheduler
    Each server has a scheduling policy that defines how the server resources are allocated to work units.
    class 
    AggrBackfillScheduler
    AggrBackfillScheduler class is an allocation policy for Server that implements aggressive backfilling.
    class 
    BackfillingScheduler
    Abstract class with helper methods common across all backfilling policies.
    class 
    ConsBackfillScheduler
    ConsBackfillScheduler class is an allocation policy for Server that implements conservative backfilling.
    class 
    DefaultScheduler
    This class implements a simple scheduler where the waiting queue can be ordered in different ways.
    class 
    PreemptionScheduler
    This class implements a scheduler with preemption and where the waiting queue can be ordered in different ways.
    class 
    ResConsBackfillScheduler
    ResConsBackfillScheduler class is an allocation policy for Server that implements conservative backfilling and supports advance reservations.

  • Uses of SimEntity in me.marcosassuncao.servsim.server

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DefaultResourcePool
    This class represents a pool of resources.
    class 
    ReservationServerUser
    ReservationServerUser is an entity that handles making and confirming reservation requests.
    class 
    ResourcePool
    This class represents a pool of resources.
    class 
    Server
    This class is a server that handles work units.
    class 
    ServerUser
    Entity represents a user who sends jobs to another entity.

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractReport
    Helper class used to create a simulation report.
    class 
    EventFileReader
    This class implements the basic functionality for an entity that loads event information from a file.
    class 
    SwfWorkloadReader
    Reads a job trace in the Standard Workload Format (SWF) and creates the corresponding workload.
